text_block_list.text: The summer intensive training begins today. In preparation for this, I created two training regimens for Admire Vega.
Simply put, one menu can be done alone while the other must be done in tandem with me.
I told her she was free to choose either and showed her both of the regimens. I expected an immediate reply, but she seemed hesitant to answer.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Give me… some time to think.
After saying that she headed into the cabin.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: These regimens… she really put a lot of thought into both of them.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: <i>She's also added training to help me improve my movement fundamentals.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: This training is suited specifically for my running style. Made specifically for me.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I know she said she didn't care which one I chose… But I can tell just by looking at these that what I need is… to cooperate with her.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: But…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san. Regarding the… training regimen.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I… want…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I… want to…
Admire Vega was searching for the right words. She had already made her decision, but was unsure of the right way to say it.
But a feeling of care and consideration could be felt around her…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Eh?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: You're right… Thank you.
Admire Vega chose to go with the regimen that she could do on her own.
As she conducted her training I continued to watch over her and continued to support her as her trainer.
Then night fell. I sat alone, looking up at the Summer Triangle with the picture book that Admire Vega had recommended me in hand.
choice_data_list: Vega, Deneb… and what's the last one?

text_block_list.text: I shuffled through the pages of the book looking for the answer, when…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Altair, it's the first magnitude star in the Aquila constellation.
Admire Vega happened to be there.
choice_data_list: Did you come to stargaze too?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Yes…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Today's training… was very easy to do. I felt like as I pushed forward… I was actually accomplishing something.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Y-Yes… But.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: The harder you work for my sake… the more my heart hurts.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Your expectations, your effort. If they're real… if they're real, I don't deserve it, my sister…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Even though she… Even though I…
choice_data_list: You think only your sister deserves this?
You think only your sister deserves this?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Eh…?
I don't know much about her little sister.
But what I do know is that the thought of her sister is causing her immeasurable pain. That's why…
choice_data_list: If you're truly running for her sake…
If you're truly running for her sake…

text_block_list.text: Neither the training regimen nor my past advice was meant solely for Admire Vega.
choice_data_list: Everything I did was for the both of you.
Everything I did was for the both of you.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: For… us…?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: For me… and for… her…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Ahh, I think I finally understand.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: That time I went home without looking up at the stars…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: And that time you called out to me at the planetarium…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: You didn't do all of that for 'me'… You did it for 'us', didn't you.
Admire Vega sat next to me and looked up at the dazzlingly beautiful night sky…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I guess I can teach you a little bit about the stars…
She then softly explained the glittering objects present billions of light years away.
